short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to help debug on publisher sites where both Prebid.js & Protected Audience auctions occur.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension helps debug publisher sites where both Prebid.js and Protected Audience (PA) auctions occur on the same page. It maps PA auctions to GPT ad slots also used in Prebid.js auctions, offering insights into ad unit configurations, SSP/seller identification, bid details, interest group insights, and auction winners. It also includes a detailed timeline and efficiency analysis of auction events.

Disclaimer: Only a limited amount of Chrome traffic currently has Protected Audience auctions enabled.
